response.original_title: The Lost Gold of Dents Run
response.overview: In 1863 A Wagon Load of Gold Bars, Along with its army escort vanished somewhere in the foothills of Pennsylvania. The gold has never been found. Despite the hopes and efforts of many treasure hunters, hobbyists, and professionals alike, the fate of the gold bars has persisted for more than a century.
response.title: The Lost Gold of Dents Run
